pageContext.claim: “[The NFL has] been working with government. I would say this. If they don't stand for the National Anthem, I hope they don't open. Other than that, I'd love to see them open.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump insisted that the NFL season start on time, but that isn't the same as government coordination. Some clubs did coordinate with state and local governments to open training facilities earlier than would have otherwise been allowed under covid-19 guidelines, but Trump implies federal assistance.
